collection:
The policy outlines our practices
concerning data collection and usage.

No Collection of Personal Information:
Cisco IOS Buddy GPT does not collect, store, or process any personal
information from its users.

Usage Data and OpenAI's Terms of
Service: Usage Data: While we do not collect personal information, anonymized
usage data may be gathered purely for the purpose of improving service
performance and functionality.

Data Security: No personal data is collected,
thus minimizing any risk of data breaches concerning personal information.
